why_cispata_for_demo: First mangrove forest with complete carbon accounting (above-ground + below-ground + sediment)
First blue carbon conservation project registered by Verra VCS
Active Verified Carbon Unit issuance with corporate buyer (Apple)
End-to-end blue finance value chain: measurement -> verification -> credit issuance -> corporate purchase -> community benefit
Demonstrates BA-014 (carbon stock to credit value) in a live, operational context
demo_value.investor_story: Cispata Bay is where blue carbon finance became real. This 11,000-hectare mangrove forest was the first to have its complete carbon measured - above-ground, below-ground, and underwater sediments - and the first blue carbon conservation project registered by Verra. With Apple as the primary corporate buyer of its Verified Carbon Units, Cispata demonstrates the complete value chain from mangrove root to carbon credit. Over 30 years, the Vida Manglar project will avoid 939,296 tonnes of CO2 emissions while generating revenue that flows directly to local communities. Nereus rates Cispata A - proven blue carbon methodology with growing market traction.
